name: onintss
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wi(w0, wss(cint(crab(s0, con0, w1)), c0)))

stmt.origin: ex(wcel(c0, con0), w0, wss(cint(crab(s0, con0, w1)), c0))

comment: If a property is true for an ordinal number, then the minimum ordinal number for which it is true is smaller or equal. Theorem Schema 61 of [Suppes] p. 228. (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2003.)
